name: Wind Spear Prototype
description:
You can fly. You can shoot webs. But you not the Iron Spider-Man, you are WindSpear.
Sandbox with city, forest, mountain and sea areas.

 

This is just experiment with physics in my spare time and I will update it in my pace. But if you like it and support me, then I can faster make a full game out of this.

What will be added:

  • Much bigger world to explore with more details
  • Trials as reasons to return back
  • Support for standalone Oculus Quest
  • New moving gadgets like arcade "magnetic" rope, hoverboard or big robot
  • Different hands for climbing/jumping parkour

Ps: Tested only in linked Quest 2 on Windows. But it should work with Vive and Index, I think. Or I fix it.
If you want it for other OS, some features or just to subscribe on updates, welcome to Discord. 

In ver 0.2 comfort grid positioned for seated play.
